mapper.sql: id, author, intro, addtime, updatetime, visit, ilike, title
mapper.insert:
insert into blog
id,
author,
intro,
addtime,
updatetime,
visit,
ilike,
title,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{visit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ilike,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update blog
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visit = #{visit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ilike = #{ilike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update blog set author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit = #{visit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ilike = #{ilike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update blog set author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit = #{visit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ilike = #{ilike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
